titles.title: A resolution celebrating 50 years of environmental progress in the Cuyahoga River Valley and Lake Erie.
A resolution celebrating 50 years of environmental progress in the Cuyahoga River Valley and Lake Erie.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: This resolution celebrates 50 years of environmental progress in the Cuyahoga River Valley and Lake Erie. In addition, the resolution expresses the Senate's commitment to improve the Great Lakes Basin's ecosystem health, drinking water quality, and wastewater infrastructure.
